DOC.brief_summary: In present study effect community-based treatment overweight obese child analyze . The treatment-method base principal method use Children Obesity Clinic Pediatric department Holbaek . The effect evaluate change body mass index standard deviation score , change blood pressure standard deviation score , quality life concentration fast blood lipid glucose one year treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Overweight Obese Children -Using `` Holbaek-Method '' Municipality Based Treatment Program .
DOC.detailed_description: In present study effect community-based treatment overweight obese child analyze . The treatment-method base principal method use Children Obesity Clinic Pediatric department Holbaek care provider eight municipality include think thoroughly use method . The treatment effect evaluate one year , effect assess change body mass index standard deviation score , change blood pressure standard deviation score , quality life ( PedsQL ) , body composition concentration fast blood lipid glucose .
